structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
ORGANIZATION AND GOVERNMENT OF CITIES OF THE SECOND CLASS (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3058, 3058-3, 3058-7, 3058-13, 3058-15, 3058-16, 3058-25, 3058-26, 3058-27, 3061, 3172.
